attributes.additional_details: As a community we want the government to reopen our local police station and have police on the streets. To make people feel safe at work and at home, it's disgusting what we are all going thru, I have been to the local mayor and police commissioner.
attributes.background: Cleveland police are doing nothing about Crime with footage, we want our local police station reopening & manning, police on the street.shop assistants are getting abuse and knife incidents, spat in the face and Burglaries Car thefts, Attacks are happening and nothing is done about it.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the police service.
